{{wiktionarypar|Dorothy}} '''Dorothy''' may refer to: *[[Dorothy (given name)]], a given name (and list of people with that name) *Dorothy, the title of an [[Old English]] dance ([[folk song]]) by Seymour Smith *[[Dorothy (opera)|''Dorothy'' (opera)]], a comic opera *[[Dorothy (comic book)|''Dorothy'' (comic book)]], a comic book based on the Wizard of Oz *DOROTHY, a device use to study tornadoes in the movie ''[[Twister (1996 film)|Twister]]'' *{{USS|Dorothy|SP-1289}}, a United States Navy patrol boat in commission from 1917 to 1918 *{{Ship|ST|Dorothy}}, A Malaysian tug in service 1958-75
In '''characters''': *[[Dorothy (MÃR)|Dorothy (''MÃR'')]], a main character in ''MÃR'' *[[Dorothy Gale]] or Dorothy, protagonist of The Wonderful Wizard of Oz by L. Frank Baum *[[Ace (Doctor Who)|Ace (''Doctor Who'')]] or Dorothy, a character played by Sophie Aldred in ''Doctor Who'' *Dorothy, a goldfish on ''Sesame Street'' owned by [[Elmo]] *Dorothy the Dinosaur, a costumed dinosaur who appears with [[The Wiggles]]
==See also== *[[Friend of Dorothy]], archaic crypto-euphemism for "gay" *[[Hurricane Dorothy (disambiguation)]] *[[Dorothea (disambiguation)]]
